data.title: Sportbike
data.description: High-performance bikes designed for speed and agility on the road.

data.title: Cruiser
data.description: Comfortable and stylish bikes designed for long-distance cruising.

data.title: Touring
data.description: Bikes designed for long-distance travel, equipped with more storage and comfort.

data.title: Dirt Bike
data.description: Off-road bikes designed for dirt trails, rough terrains, and challenging landscapes.

data.title: Naked Bike
data.description: Lightweight bikes with a minimalist design, ideal for city commuting.

data.title: Chopper
data.description: Custom motorcycles with unique designs, often featuring long forks and custom frames.

data.title: Cafe Racer
data.description: Retro-styled motorcycles inspired by the cafe racer culture, known for their sporty look.

data.title: Electric Bike
data.description: Motorcycles powered by electric motors, offering eco-friendly transportation options.
